title: Local Currency Conversion
author: Check your investment performance in Local Currency.
description: Global investors whose their base currency is Singaporean Dollar(SGD), Japanese Yen(JPY), Indian Rupee(IDR), Philippine Peso(PHP), and South Korean Won(KRW), etc. can check real-time currency conversion and FX gains losses with a click.

title: Portfolio Management
